title: Council Directive 84/218/EEC of 10 April 1984 amending Directive 66/403/EEC on the marketing of seed potatoes
header:
COUNCIL  DIRECTIVE
of 10 April 1984
amending Directive 66/403/EEC on the marketing of seed potatoes
(84/218/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 15 (2a) of Directive 66/403/EEC, '31 December 1982' is hereby replaced by '31 January 1984'.
This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 10 April 1984.
For the Council
The President
C. CHEYSSON
(1) OJ No C 104, 16. 4. 1984, p. 117.
(2) OJ No 125, 11. 7. 1966, p. 2320/66.
(3) OJ No L 203, 23. 7. 1981, p. 52.
(4) OJ No L 26, 31. 1. 1977, p. 20.
(5) OJ No L 14, 16. 1. 1981, p. 23.
